projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Comic Book Historia
projects.bodyText:
- JavaScript, Vanilla JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5, with partials to organize and display the visual aspects
 - Wireframed UI design of application using Sketch and created a database of images using Photoshop
 - Tested API routes using Postman to ensure functionality during production

projects.title: YourSpace
projects.bodyText:
- A Full-Stack web application using **React** and **Tailwind CSS** for the front end and **Python**, **Postgres**, and **Django** for the back end.
 - The project must include authentication functionality and utilize **React** Router for client-side routing. 
 -  Used Beekeeper Studio for the database and deployed the front-end on **Vercel** and the back-end on **Heroku**.

projects.title: FrankenStory
projects.bodyText:
- Utilized the MERN stack (**MongoDB**, **Express.js**, **React**, and **Node.js**) to build a full-stack web application.
 - Used **React** for the front-end to create a dynamic user interface that is both responsive and interactive.
 - Designed a scalable and flexible **MongoDB** database to store user data, with Mongoose as the Object Data Modeling (ODM) library to interact with the database
 - Created a RESTful API with Express.js to handle requests and responses between the front-end and the MongoDB database

projects.title: Persona Compendium
projects.bodyText:
- Made RESTful API fetch calls to an Express, MongoDB, Node.js backend handling all create, read, update, delete (CRUD) operations, and tested all backend routes during development using Postman. 
 - Used **Mongoose** to define schemas for MongoDB collections. 
 - Implemented ES6 tagged template literals with Styled-Components along CSS3 to provide style and flexbox layout

projects.title: Weather App
projects.bodyText:
- A React App that gives the weather of where you are based on zip code.
 - Gives the temperature and what type of weather there is.
